CWEs: CWE-601: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect')
description: The function is vulnerable to URL redirection attacks (also known as 'Open Redirect' attacks) because it blindly redirects to a URL specified in the 'from' query parameter. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to redirect users to malicious websites. This can be used for phishing attacks, stealing user credentials, or performing other malicious activities.
